text: Jozef Adamec (26 February 1942 – 24 December 2018) was a Slovak football forward and manager. He played mostly for Spartak Trnava (1959–61, 1963–64, 1966–76). He was member of Dukla Prague (1961–63), he spent one year with Slovan Bratislava (1964–65) and at the end of career played for lower-division Austrian club Slovan Wien (1977–80). ==References== ==Other websites== * Osobnosti.sk Category:1942 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Slovak footballers Category:Slovak football managers Category:Czechoslovakia at the 1962 FIFA World Cup Category:Czechoslovakia at the 1970 FIFA World Cup
title: Jozef Adamec
